content: I would like to create a search parameter for CodeableConcept.text only (not support searching on coding element). Is that possible? If so, wold the type be string?
http://hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token: 'The search parameter is processed as a string that searches text associated with the code/value - either CodeableConcept.text, Coding.display'
I think Yunwei was saying he doesn't want to search Coding.display

Yes. I would like search CodeableConcept.text only. Thanks @Josh Mandel @Lloyd McKenzie
The following question, can I specify the search is full text search instead of standard string search? For example, ?code=cancer AND screening or code=cancer AND (screening OR precedure)
